titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Pennsylvania State University IFC/Panhellenic Dance Marathon on its continued success in support of the Four Diamonds Fund at Penn State Hershey Children's Hospital.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary:
3/29/2012--Introduced. Congratulates the Pennsylvania State University IFC/Panhellenic Dance Marathon (THON) on its continued success in support of the Four Diamonds Fund at Penn State Hershey Children's Hospital.
Commends the school's students, volunteers, and supporting organizations who worked hard putting together another recordbreaking THON.
